Name: Spicy Gift Box
Description: A sharp smell emanates from deep within, burning your eyes.

Name: Hauberk of the Hearth
Description: Stoke the flame. Ever burn.

Name: Faceguard of the Hearth
Description: Stoke the flame. Ever burn.

Name: Trousers of the Hearth
Description: Stoke the flame. Ever burn.

Name: Boots of the Hearth
Description: Stoke the flame. Ever burn.

Name: Gloves of the Hearth
Description: Stoke the flame. Ever burn.

Name: Stole of the Dancing Embers
Description: “See how the shadows flicker? Like skulking assassins.”

Name: Veil of the Dancing Embers
Description: “See how the shadows flicker? Like skulking assassins.”

Name: Leggings of the Dancing Embers
Description: “See how the shadows flicker? Like skulking assassins.”

Name: Slippers of the Dancing Embers
Description: “See how the shadows flicker? Like skulking assassins.”

Name: Gages of the Dancing Embers
Description: “See how the shadows flicker? Like skulking assassins.”

Name: Forge Warden's Mantle
Description: From the ashen depths burns the vigilant gaze of the Warden.

Name: Forge Warden's Sallet
Description: From the ashen depths burns the vigilant gaze of the Warden.

Name: Forge Warden's Cuisses
Description: From the ashen depths burns the vigilant gaze of the Warden.

Name: Forge Warden's Sabatons
Description: From the ashen depths burns the vigilant gaze of the Warden.

Name: Forge Warden's Gauntlets
Description: From the ashen depths burns the vigilant gaze of the Warden.

Name: The Cardinal Fireheart
Description: “From the ashes he rose and within his heart burned a smoldering twilight.”

Name: The Cardinal Laurel
Description: “From the ashes he rose and within his heart burned a smoldering twilight.”

Name: The Cardinal Flank
Description: “From the ashes he rose and within his heart burned a smoldering twilight.”

Name: The Cardinal Talon
Description: “From the ashes he rose and within his heart burned a smoldering twilight.”

Name: The Cardinal Claw
Description: “From the ashes he rose and within his heart burned a smoldering twilight.”

Name: Fire Flare
Description: Its arrows whistle like sparkling rockets.

Name: Soaring Pyre
Description: “A gust unfurled it’s scarlet wings, then dissolved into fluttering ash that singed the amber sky.”

Name: Firelight Heater
Description: A faint light embers on its surface.

Name: Falling Star
Description: “...and as they clashed, the sparks flew and revolutions once envisioned were now inevitable.”

Name: Smoking Gun
Description: Where there’s smoke, there’s fire.

Name: Searing Needle
Description: Cauterize the wound as you cut.

Name: Firelight Buckler
Description: A faint light embers on its surface.

Name: Compass Rose
Description: A guiding light in even the deepest black.

Name: Scorched Dawn
Description: “Be the blaze that brings light to the morrow.”

Name: Iron-forged Furnace
Description: As heavy as an anvil; as hot as the forge.

Name: Lodestar Lantern
Description: Lost souls crave the warmth of its glow.

Name: Burning Beacon
Description: It’s said that on a stormy night, its light can shine brighter and further than any lighthouse.

Name: Firelight Tower
Description: A faint light embers on its surface.

Name: Frozen Flame
Description: Nothing burns quite like absolute zero.

Name: Burning Touch
Description: The thick leather protects you from its immense ambient heat, but not everyone else.

Name: Trailblazer
Description: “Alright, fine. You lead.”

Name: Licking Flame
Description: Be wary of the forking fire.

Name: Fishing Post
Description: If flipped and modified, a lamp post can make a decent fishing rod.

Name: Firelight Scepter
Description: "Be the light."

Name: Controlled Burn
Description: "Only you can prevent forest fires."

Name: Midnight Oil
Description: Combining a lantern and a pickaxe is dangerous, but convenient.

Name: Wrought-Iron Carver
Description: The heat in which it was forged still lingers in its blade.

Name: Hot Iron
Description: "Like a hot knife through butter."

Name: Lantern-lit Yurt
Description: Illuminate the night from within this cozy yurt capable of repelling even the harshest Aeternum winds.

Name: Ring of Fire
Description: Light shines in from all directions, filling its space with an inviting glow.

Name: Gilded Flame Drums
Description: Somewhere out in the burning sands is a rolling storm of crackling lightning and this drum carries its growl.

Name: Gilded Flame Guitar
Description: Strumming this guitar is like rekindling with an old friend; every note is warm and comforting.

Name: Gilded Flame Bass
Description: The belly of this bass echoes like a lonely flame burning deep in the quiet earth.
